Posts.Content: My Mother has a Breast cancer and she is now in 4 stage.we are using aryuvedic and homiopethic medicine and we found that it is working nicely with fight against pain and cancer also since long time.she takes a habit to eat aryuvedic food and no anything else. So i observe that if you are in four stage of cancer ,then you should use aryuvedic medicine and food to long live.I hope that in future this aryuvedic medicine can help and control with fight against cancer. so keep 100% hope and live normally and get your doctor Advise,You can use aryuvedic with Aelopethic medicine.There is no side effect of aryuvedic. In India and At ahmedabad ,there are so many aryuvedic center and you can call then get medicine. Best of luck and be positive and live life.
Posts.Title: Stage IV Breast Cancer Survivors?
